description.p: An aboleth was an ancient creature that ruled the primordial seas before the gods walked the planes. These creatures delighted in using their mental powers to enslave lesser beings. An aboleth spawn is a humanoid who carries within them a sliver of an aboleth's essence, giving them the aboleth's affinity for water and some of their mental ability. They might feel the desire to rule, as their primordial forbearers did, or the humanoid part of them might feel remorse for the weight of misdeeds from eons past.
Your aboleth spawn character has the following traits.
Ability Score Increase. Your Strength score increases by 1. Choose a subrace to determine which ability (Intelligence or Charisma) increases by 2.
Age. Aboleth spawn mature at a similar rate to humans; their lifespan is comparable to humans as well.
Alignment. Aboleth spawn may or may not be evil, but they have a strong tendency toward lawful alignments.
Size. Aboleth spawn are about the same size as humans. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Amphibious. You can breathe air and water.
Eternal Memory. You are proficient in History.

Aboleth Magic. At 3rd level, you can cast charm person once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. You can also cast this spell using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level. Your Aboleth Magic spellcasting ability is set by the subrace you choose (see subrace options).

Telepathy. You can speak telepathically to any creature within 30 feet of you. The creature understands you only if the two of you share a language. You can speak telepathically in this way to one creature at a time.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Common and one other language of your choice.
Choose one Aboleth Spawn subrace. This determines which ability increases by 2 and which Aboleth Magic variant you gain.
As an Intelligence-focused aboleth spawn, your mind is the strongest legacy of your aboleth heritage.
Ability Score Increase. Your Intelligence score increases by 2.
Aboleth Magic. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for Aboleth Magic.
As a Charisma-focused aboleth spawn, you wear your primordial presence like a mask of command.
Ability Score Increase. Your Charisma score increases by 2.
Aboleth Magic. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for Aboleth Magic.
You can breathe air and water.
